mapper.sql: recommended.id, ip, share_id, registrant_id, click_type, recommended.create_date, activity_uuid
mapper.select: select r.id, r.ip, r.share_id, r.registrant_id, r.click_type, r.create_date, r.activity_uuid, p.sex from recommended r inner join persion p on r.registrant_id=p.id where r.registrant_id = #{presionId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and r.activity_uuid = #{ac_uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into recommended (id, ip, share_id, registrant_id, click_type, create_date, activity_uuid) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shareId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{registrantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{clickType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{activityUuid,jdbcType=INTEGER})

activity_uuid,

mapper.update:
update recommended
ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
share_id = #{shareId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
registrant_id = #{registrantId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
click_type = #{clickType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
activity_uuid = #{activityUuid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
